      • Circle

        public Circle(double radius,
              int numOfPoints,
              Vector2d circlePosition)
        Constructor for create a circle shape
        Parameters:
        radius - the radius of the circle
        numOfPoints - the number of points that the circle has, the more it has the rounder it is
        circlePosition - the center position of the circle
